title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in boiling salted water until al dente.
Whisk the eggs and Parmesan together in a bowl.
Drain the pasta and mix with the pancetta.
Quickly stir in the egg mixture and serve immediately.
